languages.text: {n}Города-ульи, принявшие беженцев, переполнены рабочей силой — беженцы готовы работать вдвое усерднее прежних работников, истощенных каждодневной потогонкой. Многие из них пошли на службу к Вольному Торговцу: пополнив прореженный экипаж.{/n}

{n}The hives that have accepted the refugees are now overflowing with surplus labour — the refugees are willing to work twice as hard as the usual workers, who are already exhausted by their everyday toils. Many refugees have entered the Rogue Trader's service and replenished {mf|his|her} ship's crew.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Города-ульи, принявшие беженцев, переполнены рабочей силой — беженцы готовы работать вдвое усерднее прежних работников, истощенных каждодневной потогонкой. Многие из них пошли на службу к Вольному Торговцу: пополнив прореженный экипаж.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The hives that have accepted the refugees are now overflowing with work force — the refugees are willing to work twice as hard as the usual workers already exhausted in the everyday sweatshops.{/n}

{n}The hives that have accepted the refugees are now overflowing with work force — the refugees are willing to work twice as hard as the usual workers already exhausted in the everyday sweatshops.{/n}

{n}The hives that have accepted the refugees are now overflowing with surplus labour — the refugees are willing to work twice as hard as the usual workers, who are already exhausted by their everyday toils. Many refugees have entered the Rogue Trader's service and replenished {mf|his|her} ship's crew.{/n}

{n}The hives that have accepted the refugees are now overflowing with surplus labour — the refugees are willing to work twice as hard as the usual workers, who are already exhausted by their everyday toils. Many refugees have entered the Rogue Trader's service and replenished {mf|his|her} ship's crew.{/n}

{n}The hives that have accepted the refugees are now overflowing with surplus labour — the refugees are willing to work twice as hard as the usual workers, who are already exhausted by their everyday toils. Many refugees have entered the Rogue Trader's service and replenished {mf|his|her} ship's crew.{/n}

languages.text: {n}接纳难民的巢都如今满是过剩的劳动力。普通工人被日常劳动折磨得筋疲力尽，但那些难民却比他们更愿意加倍努力工作。此外，还有许多难民涌入了行商浪人麾下，充实了{mf|他的|她的}船员队列。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hives that have accepted the refugees are now overflowing with surplus labour — the refugees are willing to work twice as hard as the usual workers, who are already exhausted by their everyday toils. Many refugees have entered the Rogue Trader's service and replenished {mf|his|her} ship's crew.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}接纳难民的巢都如今满是过剩的劳动力。普通工人被日常劳动折磨得筋疲力尽，但那些难民却比他们更愿意加倍努力工作。此外，还有许多难民涌入了行商浪人麾下，充实了{mf|他的|她的}船员队列。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las colmenas que han aceptado a los refugiados están ahora rebosantes de mano de obra: los refugiados están dispuestos a trabajar el doble que los trabajadores habituales, que están agotados por sus labores cotidianas. Muchos refugiados han entrado al servicio {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente y han completado la tripulación de su nave.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hives that have accepted the refugees are now overflowing with surplus labour — the refugees are willing to work twice as hard as the usual workers, who are already exhausted by their everyday toils. Many refugees have entered the Rogue Trader's service and replenished {mf|his|her} ship's crew.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las colmenas que han aceptado a los refugiados están ahora rebosantes de mano de obra: los refugiados están dispuestos a trabajar el doble que los trabajadores habituales, que están agotados por sus labores cotidianas. Muchos refugiados han entrado al servicio {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente y han completado la tripulación de su nave.{/n}

languages.text: {n}難民を受け入れたハイヴは、余剰労働力で溢れかえっている...難民たちは、日々の労働ですでに疲れ切っている一般労働者の2倍に働くことを厭わない。多くの難民がローグトレーダーへの奉仕に名乗りを上げ、その船の乗組員として加わっていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hives that have accepted the refugees are now overflowing with surplus labour — the refugees are willing to work twice as hard as the usual workers, who are already exhausted by their everyday toils. Many refugees have entered the Rogue Trader's service and replenished {mf|his|her} ship's crew.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}難民を受け入れたハイヴは、余剰労働力で溢れかえっている...難民たちは、日々の労働ですでに疲れ切っている一般労働者の2倍に働くことを厭わない。多くの難民がローグトレーダーへの奉仕に名乗りを上げ、その船の乗組員として加わっていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les ruches ayant accepté des réfugiés disposent désormais d'un surplus de main-d'œuvre. Ces derniers, volontaires, travaillent deux fois plus que les ouvriers habituels, lesquels sont déjà exténués par leurs tâches quotidiennes... De nombreux réfugiés se sont mis au service {mf|du|de la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, renouvelant son équipage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hives that have accepted the refugees are now overflowing with surplus labour — the refugees are willing to work twice as hard as the usual workers, who are already exhausted by their everyday toils. Many refugees have entered the Rogue Trader's service and replenished {mf|his|her} ship's crew.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les ruches ayant accepté des réfugiés disposent désormais d'un surplus de main-d'œuvre. Ces derniers, volontaires, travaillent deux fois plus que les ouvriers habituels, lesquels sont déjà exténués par leurs tâches quotidiennes... De nombreux réfugiés se sont mis au service {mf|du|de la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, renouvelant son équipage.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Makropole, die Flüchtlinge aufgenommen haben, verfügen nun über endlos viele Arbeitskräfte. Die Flüchtlinge sind bereit, doppelt so hart zu schuften wie die gewöhnlichen Arbeiter, die von ihren alltäglichen Mühen schon gründlich erschöpft sind. Viele Flüchtlinge sind in den Dienst {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} eingetreten und sind nun Teil {mf|seiner|ihrer} Schiffscrew.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hives that have accepted the refugees are now overflowing with surplus labour — the refugees are willing to work twice as hard as the usual workers, who are already exhausted by their everyday toils. Many refugees have entered the Rogue Trader's service and replenished {mf|his|her} ship's crew.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Makropole, die Flüchtlinge aufgenommen haben, verfügen nun über endlos viele Arbeitskräfte. Die Flüchtlinge sind bereit, doppelt so hart zu schuften wie die gewöhnlichen Arbeiter, die von ihren alltäglichen Mühen schon gründlich erschöpft sind. Viele Flüchtlinge sind in den Dienst {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} eingetreten und sind nun Teil {mf|seiner|ihrer} Schiffscrew.{/n}
